title: Graphik Google font equivalent
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418175020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2011-03-Esquire-Graphik-2_5600.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418175020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1393596260_MG_0741%20(1)_4554.jpeg)

Can anyone match a Google font equivalent to Graphik?

Thanks so much!
author: salisae

comments.content:
Is there a reason besides saving money to not just get the real thing?

hhp
We do have it but we're looking for an alternative for email designs.

So Graphik's EULA prohibits use in emails?

hhp
